title: WTB T205 Leach & Leifield tough backs

posts.post_title: WTB T205 Leach & Leifield tough backs
posts.post_content:
I am looking for a couple of T205's.  Namely:

T205 Thomas Leach with one of the following backs:  Drum, Broadleaf black or American Beauty black

T205 A. Liefield  Hindu back

T205 John D Miller

T205 John D over B miller

Pm me with what you have and I will share my email for scans.

Thanks.

Howard
